quote.text: Learning a new language opens doors to new worlds

sections.title: Goals Achieved
sections.instruction: Revisit your Vision Board from the first week and reflect on which goals you've achieved and which ones you're still working towards.
sections.content: [Write your reflection here about your achieved goals and progress - minimum 100 words]

sections.title: Using Spanish
sections.instruction: Reflect on your experiences using Spanish in real life and how you plan to use it in the future.
sections.content: [Write about your practical experiences using Spanish and future plans - minimum 100 words]

sections.title: My Learning Process
sections.instruction: Compare your Spanish knowledge/skills from the beginning to the end of the course, and reflect on the learning process.
sections.content: [Write about your learning process, what worked, what didn't, favorite assignments, etc. - minimum 100 words]
